pr_title: 6301 check reg ripper error logs and report any errors

timeline.message:
Read error logs and update plugins for errors

Read error logs and update pluginks for errors.

Error checking for regripper plugins

Error checking for regripper plugins

timeline.bodyText: Would it be worth also sending a notification to the user to let them know? Or is the fact that we are running regripper not explicitly stated in the Recent Activity module description?
timeline.author: dannysmyda

replies.bodyText: I just put the warning in the log for debugging purposes if needed. Since not all plugins are parsed in Autopsy this will log the plugins that actually get an error that autopsy may not use.
replies.author: markmckinnon

replies.bodyText: Okay, last thing, could we make the string checking case insensitive?
replies.author: dannysmyda

replies.bodyText: changed to check to for case insensitive, good catch.
replies.author: markmckinnon

timeline.message:
Update ExtractRegistry.java

Change contains to also ccheck only for lower case as well
